mapper.select: SELECT fr.FosterID as fosterId, fr.StartDate as startDate, fr.EndDate as endDate, fr.FosterFee as fosterFee, fr.FosterStatus as fosterStatus, fr.FosterRemarks as fosterRemarks, fr.DailyStatus as dailyStatus FROM apptFoster af LEFT JOIN fosterRecord fr ON af.FosterID = fr.FosterID WHERE af.ApptID = #{apptId}
